attributes.action: Change the law to claw back the powers of the Prime Minister.
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron has stated, again, that he 'reserves the right' to intervene in Syria even in the face of a 'NO' vote in the House of Commons.  It CANNOT be right that one man has the power to take this country into a war in defiance of the representatives of the people of this country telling him not to do so.  In a democracy no one man has the right to hold such power and David Cameron MUST be stopped.
